content: Amateurs Fear Getting Failed at Start, Professionals embrace Failures and Learn From them It doesn’t matter what is your goal — you need to start. If you wait for all the things to make sense then you might end up doing nothing. The best time to start anything was 10 years ago, the second best time is now. Don’t wait for some magical moment or “X” number of experience or something similar. Don’t wait to become the best. Start small and have an attitude of a professional. Want to start a youtube channel about fitness — start now and record your journey. Want to write a book — start now and write one page daily. You will fail — terribly, people will comment, be mean but you need to learn and improve and then repeat. Success will come behind you. Here is a link to sign up for my personal list
